titles: The key of saving knovvledge, opening out of the holy Scriptures, the right way, and straight passage to eternall life, or, A dialogue wherein the chiefe principles of the Christian religion are unfolded for the enabling of Christian people, to understand the Word of God ... composed by Geo. Walker ...
author: Walker, George, 1581?-1651.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
